remarks: The value of the operation constructing the support of a function with a given domain.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 22-Apr-2019.)
statement:
suppvalfn $p |- ( ( F Fn X /\ X e. V /\ Z e. W ) -> ( F supp Z ) = { i e. X | ( F ` i ) =/= Z } ) $.
$d F i $.
$d V i $.
$d W i $.
$d X i $.
$d Z i $.
